title: 3 Key Dev Team Metrics | Engineering Leadership
description: Wondering what are the best metrics to track for your engineering team? Don't get bogged down by tracking too many. Make sure the ones you track tell a story about the actual effectiveness of your team. These were the THREE KEY metrics I tracked for our team of ~300 software engineers.

title: Be Bold With Your Backlog | Engineering Management
description:
You know that long list of bugs that you never seem to get to? That's the backlog. Sure, you can let it grow forever, but that has a massive impact on team morale.

Consider adopting this bold backlog management approach! I've seen it used by one of the world's most successful companies. It is the soul of prioritization.

title: The Secret to Constant Dev Team Innovation | Engineering Leadership
description: As a company matures, it can be tough to balance building new features and maintaining the product capabilities you've already built. This video describes the Daily, Weekly, and Yearly approaches we took in my company to ensure we were always innovating in our software product suite.
